about_the_game:
this Is My First Game.

This Game Is Highly Inspired By "exit 8".

---
You are the security guard of the museum and need to check the museum for potential trespassers.
During your shift, you notice that things in the museum change, like the pictures on the walls or the objects presented in the museum.
If that happens, you are going to run towards the big "EXIT" sign to leave the room but then you notice, that you are in an seemingly endless loop.
---

In this game, you have to go through nine rooms to reach the end.
In the first round, you will receive an introduction to grasp the game and see a room without any anomalies.
If you encounter an anomaly, you need to follow the path with the big exit sign. An anomaly could be something small, like a thrown-over object, or something significant, like a moving animal.
In this version of the game, you can see which anomaly (if any) occurred in the previous room.
Furthermore, you will receive an introduction to the game at the beginning.
In the pause menu, you can see how many anomalies you have encountered so far.
There is even an easter-egg; let's see if you can find it :).

Play Time
15-60 minutes

About Video Distribution
・Distribution of video is available to everyone without permission.
・Monetization with video content from the game is permitted.
・Please be fair and give the games name in your video.

We will not be liable for any damages caused by the distribution of videos of this game.
The contents of these guidelines are subject to change without notice.

name: Exit the museum
short_description: Exit the museum is a game highly inspired by "Exit 8". You are the security guard of a museum and have to go through nine appearingly similar rooms. There is a ~30% chance of nothing beeing wrong in comparison to the first "Showroom".
